mapper.select: select sum(b.splpc+b.vat) AS sum ,SUM(CASE WHEN DELNG_SE_CODE='CARD_ISSUE' THEN b.splpc+b.vat ELSE 0 END) AS card_sum ,SUM(CASE WHEN DELNG_SE_CODE='CARD_ISSUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_count ,SUM(CASE WHEN DELNG_SE_CODE='CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE' THEN b.splpc+b.vat ELSE 0 END) AS cash_sum ,SUM(CASE WHEN DELNG_SE_CODE='CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_count from delng_credt a right outer join delng b on a.mber_code=b.mber_code and a.mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn and a.rcipt_no=b.rcipt_no inner join mber c on b.mber_code=c.mber_code inner join biz d on c.biz_code=d.biz_code right outer join mber_basis e on c.mber_code=e.mber_code where b.CARD_DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT d.cmpnm, e.adres, e.biz_type_name, e.biz_item, d.trmnl_no, d.pg_trmnl_no, d.pg_van, c.usid, case e.pay_type when 'N' then '일반' else ( case e.pay_type when 'B' then '바로정산' else '익일입금' end ) end as payType, b.rcipt_no, (SELECT adi_cn FROM delng_adi WHERE mber_code=b.mber_code AND mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND rcipt_no=b.rcipt_no AND adi_code='PURCHSR_MBTLNUM') AS purchsrMbtlnum, b.splpc, b.vat, b.delng_se_code, a.card_type, a.instlmt_month, a.issue_cmpny_nm, a.card_no, a.pg_van_gb, a.van_pg_comp, TO_DATE( b.confm_dt || b.confm_time , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as confm_dt,
b.confm_no, b.sms_auth_number, b.good_nm, b.payment_device, (SELECT mbtlnum FROM mber_basis WHERE mber_code=c.mber_code) AS mbtlnum, TO_DATE((SELECT confm_dt || confm_time FROM delng WHERE trget_mber_code=b.mber_code AND trget_mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND trget_rcipt_no=b.rcipt_no AND delng_se_code IN('CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL')), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS cnclConfmDt, b.bigo, e.mber_name, e.company_name, e.biz_num, e.mber_mobile, e.mber_phone, e.calculate_type FROM delng b left outer join delng_credt a on a.mber_code=b.mber_code AND a.mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND a.rcipt_no=b.rcipt_no inner join mber c on b.mber_code=c.mber_code inner join biz d on c.biz_code=d.biz_code right outer join mber_basis e on c.mber_code =e.mber_code WHERE b.delng_se_code IN('CARD_ISSUE','CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE')

SELECT count(1) count FROM delng b left outer join delng_credt a on a.mber_code=b.mber_code AND a.mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND a.rcipt_no=b.rcipt_no inner join mber c on b.mber_code=c.mber_code inner join biz d on c.biz_code=d.biz_code right outer join mber_basis e on c.mber_code =e.mber_code WHERE b.delng_se_code IN('CARD_ISSUE','CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE')

select d.cmpnm , e.adres , e.biz_type_name , e.biz_item , d.trmnl_no , d.pg_trmnl_no , d.pg_van , c.usid , case e.pay_type when 'N' then '일반' else ( case e.pay_type when 'B' then '바로정산' else '익일입금' end ) end as pay_type , b.TRGET_RCIPT_NO as RCIPT_NO ,(SELECT adi_cn FROM delng_adi WHERE mber_code=b.mber_code AND mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND rcipt_no=b.TRGET_RCIPT_NO AND adi_code='PURCHSR_MBTLNUM') AS purchsr_mbtlnum , b.SPLPC , b.VAT , a.card_type , a.instlmt_month , a.issue_cmpny_nm , a.card_no , a.pg_van_gb , a.van_pg_comp , b.confm_time , b.confm_no , b.sms_auth_number , b.good_nm , b.payment_device , e.mbtlnum , TO_DATE( b.CONFM_DT || b.CONFM_TIME , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as cnclConfmDt , TO_DATE( (select CONFM_DT || CONFM_TIME from delng dd where dd.delng_se_code IN('CARD_ISSUE','CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE') and dd.MBER_CODE = b.MBER_CODE and dd.RCIPT_NO = b.TRGET_RCIPT_NO ) , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as CONFM_DT , b.delng_se_code , b.BIGO , e.mber_name , e.company_name , e.biz_num , e.mber_mobile , e.mber_phone , e.calculate_type from delng b inner join MBER_BASIS e on e.MBER_CODE = b.MBER_CODE inner join mber c on c.MBER_CODE = e.MBER_CODE inner join biz d on d.biz_code = c.biz_code left join delng_credt a on a.mber_code=b.mber_code AND a.mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND b.TRGET_RCIPT_NO=a.rcipt_no where b.delng_se_code IN('CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL')

select count(1) cnt from delng b inner join MBER_BASIS e on e.MBER_CODE = b.MBER_CODE inner join mber c on c.MBER_CODE = e.MBER_CODE inner join biz d on d.biz_code = c.biz_code left join delng_credt a on a.mber_code=b.mber_code AND a.mber_code_sn=b.mber_code_sn AND b.TRGET_RCIPT_NO=a.rcipt_no where b.delng_se_code IN('CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL')

select distinct a.confm_dt , a.delng_se_code, sum(a.splpc + a.vat) over (PARTITION BY a.confm_dt , a.delng_se_code ) totSum, count(1) over (PARTITION BY a.confm_dt , a.delng_se_code ) totCnt from delng a inner join MBER c on a.mber_code = c.mber_code where 1=1 and a.delng_se_code IN('CARD_ISSUE','CARD_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_CNCL','CASH_RCIPT_ISSUE') AND a.confm_dt between :dateStart and :dateEnd AND c.biz_code in (SELECT aaa.biz_code FROM biz aaa START WITH aaa.biz_code = :memberBizeCode CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR aaa.biz_code = aaa.trget_biz_code)
order by a.confm_dt , a.delng_se_code
